{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = R6400_01.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1750 Smart WiFi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R6400.aspx |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = R6400 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -100NAS |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY315100300 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = U12H332T00 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4708A0;BCM4708A0KFEBG; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 800 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF1G08AA-TI; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646Q-BCK0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 44:94:FC |oui = 44:94:FC
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2604L;SiGe, 2604L, 509GH;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;5003L1, 218BN, 1219 MY;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U12H332 |manuf_rev = T00 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = FreshTomato-ARM,
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/05/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00Z0V2NQ8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China, Vietnam
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1300 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *OEM: [[Foxconn]] ([[Ambit]]) [https://github.com/mirror/dd-wrt/blob/master/src/router/netgear/ambitCfg-r6400.h U12H332T00]
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32812-netgear-r6400-ac1750-smart-wifi-router-reviewed ''NETGEAR R6400 AC1750 Smart WiFi Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4708A0 (KFEBG) :*RAM: 256 MB, Flash: 128 MB :*2.4GHz Radio - [[Broadcom]] BCM4331 ::- ''SiGE'' SE2604L 2.4GHz Power Amplifier (x3) ::- ''Skyworks'' SKY13377 6GHz SPDT switch (x3) ::- ''Skyworks'' SKY65405-21 2.4GHz LNA (x3) :*5GHz radio - [[Broadcom]] BCM4360 ::- ''Skyworks'' SE5003L1 5GHz 23dBm Power Amplifier (x3) ::- ''Skyworks'' SKY13370 6GHz SPDT switch (x3) ::- ''Skyworks'' Unidentified 5GHz LNA (x3) *[http://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/netgear/netgear-r6400-ac1750-r247/ ''NETGEAR R6400 Reviewed'' on '''OpenITforum'''] :[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/147-netgear-r6400/ ''Netgear R6400 photo gallery'']
